Summary: three moon size disk shape-orange red
divs: Sighting Detailson or about march 15 1966,i left my home at about 7 p.m.to visit a friend who lived across a park from where i lived,while walking through this park i looked upto the sky and to my amazement i observed three(about moon size lights,disk shaped)they were a red orange in a triangular formation moveing very slowly in a south east direction,the sky was partly cloudy,the lights were nearly motionless,they than began forming what i would call geometric patterns,they formed in a circle revolving in a counter clock wise motion then forming in a straight line and again revolving in a counter clock wise movement with the center object acting as a hub.one of the lights then took off to the south horizon at an unbelivle speed it remained there for a moment then returned again at a fantastic speed to the other two lights they again resumed to go into the aformentioned patterns.i observed this for about five minuets,i belived the entire sighting lasted for app.half an hour.i was not sure what to think as i have not seen anything like this in my life(nor have i since)i recall thinking the world as we know it will never be the same again.there were bullitens issued on a major t.v. station requesting viewers to please not call the station as their switch boards were jammed with reports,adding they had no information on these lights,but would report when they did.there were no following reports,until a few days later in a very short article burried deep in the paper stateing that the lights were the results of a gas experment that took place in new jersey.that was all there was reported on this sighting.i was ninteen years old at the time,and blessed with 20-10 vision,this memory still vexes me even to this day.thank you sam verdier
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There were no other sightings in New York on or around March 15th 1966
